plot: A farmer facing foreclosure goes to the city and bets everything on a horse race. When he wins he goes back to the country in an expensive car and prevents the landlord from evicting his parents.
title: The 100 to One Shot; or, A Run of Luck
plot_es: A farmer facing foreclosure goes to the city and bets everything on a horse race. When he wins he goes back to the country in an expensive car and prevents the landlord from evicting his parents.
original_name: The 100 to One Shot; or, A Run of Luck
plot_en: A farmer facing foreclosure goes to the city and bets everything on a horse race. When he wins he goes back to the country in an expensive car and prevents the landlord from evicting his parents.
